data.message: Why isn't there an emoji face representing a confused or quizzical face.

replies.message: Hi Xander. If you have a particular Reaction you'd like to see included, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2qtqmgI. We appreciate your feedback. -Jessica
Did not get new camera. Not happy
With so many recipes on Facebook there should be a lip smacking yummy reaction button
Facebook I ask you to cancel the integration of Facebook Pages outstanding requests

Facebook  just thought I should give you a heads up just in case. I had trouble remembering my new password so I believe I sent a request to get that email with a code. Well I remembered my PW so you can disregard any issues or lack of activity if there is any regarding me not replying to it or using it.
Facebook PLEASE GET RID OF TOP STORIES. THIS IS REALLY ANNOYING.

Thanks for your feedback, Chris. We truly appreciate all feedback from the Facebook community, and we use it to help inform our decisions. Let us know what would make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2rMoLlJ. -Jon
I cannt use my account name lynlym paradero
Please give me one day of purple flower 😣😣 I want it sssooo badly,  my mom just beat cancer second time and until yesterday I didnt know for this beautiful reaction. 😣

Facebook  
Joan Vollmer
Joan Vollmer Hey FB PLEASE reply to my message. This is a temporary account. FB has locked me out of my real account and hidden it while I am backpacking overseas. Making it impossible to contact those I am supposed to be staying with as well as letting my loved ones know I am not dead.
